
"LINESTRING(94.3997735 27.3087155000001,
94.4001283000001 27.3042098, 
94.4002119 27.3038977000001,

94.4008978000001 27.3021286000001,
94.4008142000001 27.3014894,94.400513 27.300865,

94.4002286 27.3003299000001)"




select ST_AsText(geom) from network where id in(7347 ,7345, 7341, 7342, 7377)

SELECT ST_Length(ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromEWKT('SRID=4326;LINESTRING(94.3997735 27.3087155000001,94.4001283000001 27.3042098)'),26986));


line1 -2
line2 -3
line3 -4
line4 -5
line5 -6
line6 -7
line7 -8



SELECT ST_Length(ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromEWKT('SRID=4326;LINESTRING(94.3997735 27.3087155000001,94.4001283000001 27.3042098)'),26986));

SELECT ST_Length(ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromEWKT('SRID=4326;LINESTRING(94.4008978000001 27.3021286000001,94.4008142000001 27.3014894,94.400513 27.300865)'),26986));

SELECT ST_Length(ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromEWKT('SRID=4326;LINESTRING(94.4003123000001 27.3005380000001,94.4002286 27.3003299000001)'),26986));

###3857 projection 
SELECT ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromText('x1',2249),3857)) As wgs_geom;
